Package siminov.core.exception

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    IException
    Exposes method to deal with exception It has methods to set exception class name, exception method name, exception message.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    DatabaseException
    This is general exception, which is thrown through core database API's, if any exception occur which doing any database operations.
    DeploymentException
    This is runtime-time exception, which is thrown if any exception occur at time of initialization of core.
    PrematureEndOfParseException
    This is SAX exception, which is thrown if any exception occur at time of parsing descriptors.
    SiminovCriticalException
    It is a superclass of runtime exception that can be thrown during the normal operation of the Java Virtual Machine.
    SiminovException
    This is general exception, which is thrown through Siminov APIs, if any exception occur while performing any tasks.
